top.title: Zelensky gives stark warning as EU leaders start crunch talks on Russia's frozen cash
top.summary: The leaders are deciding whether to loan tens of billions of euros in frozen Russian assets to fund Ukraine's military and economic needs.

top.title: French 'Doctor Death' who poisoned patients jailed for life
top.summary: A court finds Frédéric Péchier guilty of contaminating infusion bags with substances that caused cardiac arrest or hemorrhaging.

top.title: Don't let Matilda's death fuel anger, say family of Bondi victim, 10, at funeral
top.summary: Lina Chernykh tells the BBC her niece Matilda was a joyous child who spread love everywhere she went.

top.title: One in three using AI for emotional support and conversation, UK says
top.summary: The Artificial Intelligence Security Institute (AISI) says the tech is being used by one in 25 people daily.

top.title: Facebook tests £9.99 monthly subscription for sharing more than two links
top.summary: Meta is encouraging users to verify themselves to unlock more features or engagement with their posts.

top.title: Parents told to lead by example and turn off phones this Christmas
top.summary: The children's commissioner says children are "crying  out" for family time over the festive break.

title.#text: AI companies are sick of their favorite buzzword
Apple opens iOS to third-party app stores in Japan
Kuxiu’s S3 MagSafe power bank is bigger and better and probably won’t explode
